name: The Friendly Bruisers
description: Hailing from Widowâ€™s Peak, the The Friendly Bruisers owe a debt of gratitude to the Groodu for deliverance in their time of need. One of the few who witnessed the Osmerian Anomaly, and equipped with the knowledge of what may have actually happened, they look towards the future with a glint in their eye. Their future is bright. The only question: what comes next?
